rules_text:
Surveil 1, then draw a card. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]
Create a tapped Treasure token.
flavor_text: [i]Ajani's first steps on Panxiou were inward. Too long had he fought the battles of others, rather than his own.[/i]
